title: Books for Blocks
description: Find a way to convert independent literature into non-fungible tokens on Cardano MainNet to support the creatives in the community.
solution: Collaborate with programmers who have the knowledge to convert a scanned document into NFTs on Cardano Mainnet. I write books for blocks.
experience: I have written 27 novels in 2021 and hold the world record for the most novels written in a year. Now I want to publish them on Mainnet.
